title: Barbecued marinated vegetables
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', 'handful coarsely chopped fresh basil', '2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced', '1 small aubergine, thickly sliced', '2 red peppers, seeded and cut into wide strips', '3 courgettes, sliced', '6 fresh mushrooms, stems removed']
